verses.verse: O God <S%H430><s%>, you have cast us off <S%H2186><s%>, you have scattered <S%H6555><s%> us <S%H599><s%>, you have been displeased; O turn yourself to us again <S%H7725><s%>.
You have made the earth <S%H776><s%> to tremble <S%H7493><s%>; you have broken <S%H6480><s%> it <S%H7495><s%>: heal the breaches <S%H7667><s%> there <S%H4131><s%>; for it shakes.
You have showed <S%H7200><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> hard things <S%H7186><s%>: you have made us to drink <S%H8248><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of astonishment <S%H8653><s%>.
You have given <S%H5414><s%> a banner <S%H5251><s%> to them that fear <S%H3373><s%> you <S%H5127><s%>, that it may be displayed because <S%H6440><s%> of the truth <S%H7189><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
That your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered <S%H2502><s%>; save <S%H3467><s%> with your right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and hear me <S%H6030><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness <S%H6944><s%>; I will rejoice <S%H5937><s%>, I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and measure out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine <S%H4519><s%>, and Manasseh is mine <S%H669><s%>; Ephraim also is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my lawgiver <S%H2710><s%>;
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my washpot <S%H5518><s%>; over Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast out <S%H7993><s%> my shoe <S%H5275><s%>: Philistia <S%H6429><s%>, triumph you because of me <S%H7321><s%>.
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4692><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? who will lead <S%H5148><s%> me into Edom <S%H123><s%>?
Will not you <S%H430><s%>, O God, which had cast us off <S%H2186><s%>? and you <S%H430><s%>, O God, which did not go out <S%H3318><s%> with our armies <S%H6635><s%>?
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> from trouble <S%H6862><s%>: for vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>: for he it is that shall tread down <S%H947><s%> our enemies <S%H6862><s%>.
